item.title: RT by @conduitxyz: Devs, take note. ( ˘͈ ᵕ ˘͈♡)˚๐*˟♡ @conduitxyz just launched their Hub, giving you everything you need for rollups in one place. APIs, RPCs, config files +++ no sign-ins required. Thank you Conduit for making devs life easier (ㅅ´ ˘ `)

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Conduit will:
- run a @blockscoutcom instance for you - spin up a @superbridgeapp UI for you, more like Decent and Relay can be added quickly in our app - most modern wallets can add custom EVM networks - provide public and private RPC endpoints - refer you to great partners!
item.dc:creator: @forrestnorwood
item.description:
Conduit will:

- run a @blockscoutcom instance for you
- spin up a @superbridgeapp UI for you, more like Decent and Relay can be added quickly in our app
- most modern wallets can add custom EVM networks
- provide public and private RPC endpoints
- refer you to great partners!

item.title:

VIP plan for all DeFi partners

item.title:
RT by @conduitxyz: Phala 2.0 combines TEE with ZK rollups powered by OP-Succinct, creating a game-changing solution for secure, private, and interoperable AI operations.
TEE+ZKP+OP will empower AI agents, like @ai16zdao's, to operate securely and enable seamless cross-chain strategies. 🧬
item.dc:creator: @PhalaNetwork
item.description:
Phala 2.0 combines TEE with ZK rollups powered by OP-Succinct, creating a game-changing solution for secure, private, and interoperable AI operations.

TEE+ZKP+OP will empower AI agents, like @ai16zdao's, to operate securely and enable seamless cross-chain strategies. 🧬

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang
item.description:
When I went on @BanklessHQ with @pumatheuma, we discussed why ZK is so bullish for Ethereum

@PhalaNetwork is showing what ZK + OP-Succinct can do for one rollup today

Conduit is all about helping rollups use the latest + best tech for their use case. This is the latest example

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.title: RT by @conduitxyz: Great read to deep dive into what Op-Succinct means for L2s, Phala's mission & products, and why this TEE-ZKL-OP synergy is a game-changer 🍵
